WorkItem.Description: Not sure why, no documentation to support it anywhere, but optimizing on 4.3.2 recommends all reforge to Crit (should be Mastery) after hit/exp caps.  In 4.3.1, it was correct with recommending Mastery.
WorkItem.Summary: Crit jumped Mastery for Enh Shaman

Comments.Message: I saw this on my enh, as well, but since rawr is usually right and I'm usually wrong, I went ahead and regemmed the couple pieces of gear and reforged the way it wanted and put it on the dummy.  I was 1500-1800 dps down with the new settings.  Please revert whatever you changed.
For now, I'm going back to 4.3.1.  Not sure what happened, but I'm sure they will fix it in the next release.

Yeah, mastery has a low value now ... it went from 1.2 to 0.18 and my dps dropped from 35k to 17k :-)

http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/6388/myrddinrawr.jpg
Found the problem and have fixed it.  Will be fixed for the next release.
